name: EPA_NUM_COMPS
description: This table holds the conditional comparison information for electronic prior authorization questions.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SING_COMP_OP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the comparison operator to use when doing a single comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.
entries: Always greater than or equal to
Always less than or equal to

columns.name: SING_COMP_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the comparison value to use when doing a single comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_OP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the lower comparison operator to use when doing a range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the lower comparison value to use when doing a range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_OP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the upper comparison operator to use when doing a range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_VAL
columns.description: This item holds the upper comparison value to use when doing a range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: NUM_COMP_NEXT_QUESN
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the next question to show after a question meets the conditional logic comparison requirements.

columns.name: SING_COMP_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the comparison operator to use when doing a single date comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: SING_COMP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the comparison value to use when doing a single instant comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the lower comparison operator to use when doing a date range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_LOW_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the lower comparison operator to use when doing an instant range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the upper comparison operator to use when doing a date range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.

columns.name: RNG_COMP_UP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the upper comparison operator to use when doing an instant range comparison for an electronic prior authorization question.
